name: MazeAR
description: This is a 3D Maze in which you should carry out a ball from up to down through ten levels. For this purpose it is necessary to hold a maze in hand and to turn a palm to direct a ball to the exit. You need а picture "KUZ MAZE AR" to point the camera of your device. The  picture can be seen below. You can either print it or open it on your friend's smartphone.
